at.ac.fhstp.sonitalk.utils

Class CRC

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.fhstp.sonitalk.utils.CRC

  • public class CRC
extends java.lang.Object
    The CRC class adds and also checks the parity bits. The main part of both functions is a xor_logic_gate. Beside that it has a helper function for counting occurrences.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CRC() 
      CRC(byte[] generatorPolynom)

      Returns the number of occurrences of searchedChar in input.
      java.lang.String parityBit(java.lang.String bitOfText)

    • Method Detail

      • checkMessageCRC

        public int checkMessageCRC(int[] messageDecoded)
        Checks if a message was received correctly. Returns 0 if the CRC is correct.
        Parameters:
        messageDecoded - bit sequence containing the message to be checked
        Returns:
        0 if the CRC is correct otherwise a positive integer

      • parityBit

        public java.lang.String parityBit(java.lang.String bitOfText)
        Calls xorArray to get a remainder bit sequence depending on the generator polynomal. returns this bit sequence as error detection for the message
        Parameters:
        bitOfText - the message after which the error detection bit sequence is generated
        Returns:
        error detection bit sequence

      • countOccurrences

        public static int countOccurrences(java.lang.String input,
                                   char searchedChar)
        Returns the number of occurrences of searchedChar in input. Source : https://stackoverflow.com/a/275969/5232306
        Parameters:
        input -
        searchedChar -
        Returns:
        How many occurrences of searchedChar are in input.
